name: Phase Ship
description: Phase Ship is a two-button arcade space shooter where you swap between dimensions to defend your capital ship from asteroids and space pirates. The game has an events system to switch things up on occasion, a couple power-ups, and a high score system. Unlike most of my projects which only have sound effects made in LabChirp, this one actually has theme music, made by Nick West. This was made for 2017’s Becker Arcade Jam.
